org.fujion.component

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.component.BaseComponent
      • org.fujion.component.BaseUIComponent
        • org.fujion.component.Window
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisable, IElementIdentifier, INamespace

    @Component(tag="window",
           widgetClass="Window",
           content=AS_CHILD,
           parentTag="*",
           childTag=@Component.ChildTag(value="*"))
public class Window
extends BaseUIComponent
implements INamespace
    A window component with a title bar and maximize/minimize/close buttons. May be used in modal, popup, or inline modes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Window.CloseAction
      Action upon window closure.
      static class  Window.Mode
      Possible display modes for a window.
      static class  Window.Position
      Placement of window in view port when first displayed.
      static class  Window.Size
      Size state for a window.
